name: supply_chain
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool corporate_supply_chain.
Tool description: Finding a company's actual suppliers and customers is often very difficult. Many companies do not want to reveal this information to their competitors.  Leveraging hybrid data sources to deliver a complete picture of company supply chain ecosystems, this Corporate Supply Chain API enables investors to construct hedges and build statistical arbitrage strategies for a given corporate supply chain.
API description: Fetches supply chain information for a given stock ticker.

ticker.description: The stock symbol of the company to get supply chain information for.
